description: Ms. codex. Title provided by cataloger. Light cream glazed paper with laid lines and chain lines (grouped by three?) visible. Catchword on the verso of each leaf. Severe worm damage. According to the colophons, text 2 copied on 11 Rajab 911 (fol. 20b) and text 6 copied on 15 Shaʻbān 850 (fol. 35a).
author: Ibn Qāḍī ʻAjlūn, Abū Bakr ibn ʻAbd Allāh, 1437 or 1438-1521 or 1522
abstract: Collection of texts on various topics (ḥadīths, Islamic law, lexicography, etc.)
contents: 1. fol. 1a-8b: al-Juzʼ al-thālith min al-fawāʼid al-muntaqāh al-gharāʼib ʻan al-shuyūkh al-ʻawālī min ḥadīth Abī ʻAbd Allāh Aḥmad ibn al-Ḥasan ibn ʻAbd al-Jabbār al-Ṣūfī.
2. fol. 9a-20b: Kitāb mukhtaṣār Taṣḥīḥ Ghāyat al-ikhtiṣār / Abū Bakr ibn Qāḍī ʻAjlūn.
3. fol. 21b-22a: [List of names of God (al-asmāʼ al-ḥusná)].
4. fol. 23a-28b: Istidʻā mubārak / [Zayn?] al-Dīn Abū al-Faraj ibn Abī Bakr ibn al-Ḥusayn al-ʻUthmānī al-Shāfiʻī al-Marāghī (see fol. 28b).
5. fol. 29b-30a: al-Arbaʻūn al-Nawāwīyah [excerpts] / Muḥyī al-Dīn al-Nawawī.
6. fol. 31a-35a: Sharḥ Muthallath Quṭrub / Saʻd al-Dīn al-Bārizī.
7. fol. 35b: [...] min kalām al-ʻAllāmah Ibn al-MYLQ(?) al-Shāfiʻī.
provenance: Waqf statement on fol. 1a. Ownership statement on fol. 31a. Acquired from Abraham Shalom Yahuda, 1942.
creator: Ibn Qāḍī ʻAjlūn, Abū Bakr ibn ʻAbd Allāh, 1437 or 1438-1521 or 1522
ابن قاضي عجلون، ابو بكر ابن عبد الله
subject: God (Islam)—Name—Early works to 1800
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
